name: Preschool/PreK Program (2.5 - 5 years)
description: Their preschooler program provides a balanced curriculum for your growing child. The curriculum is a balanced mix of Montessori, Reggio, and play-based programs. The focus is school readiness, the program nurtures key social, physical, and cognitive skills needed for their future school success! Additional enrichment components are included in the program as well as a Chinese Mandarin 中文 class in the afternoon to foster your child's bilingual skills!

The focus is school readiness, the program nurtures key social, physical, and cognitive skills needed for their future school success! howToGetIt: They have a rolling enrollment system i.e. you can join any time of the year, if space is available. Please email them for tour information [valencia@creativegardenslearning.com]. After the tour, you may turn in an application to enroll. If there is no space, you may fill out a waiting list form, and we'll contact you as soon as a space becomes available.
cost: This is a fee based service.
